CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains activity then leaves room
MOT sets CHI down on rug
MOT places CHI in a sitting position
MOT sits down on rug near CHI
MOT picks up rubber duck and squeezes it in front of CHI
CHI smiles then reaches toward MOT putting his hand on the jack+in+the+box
MOT sets rubber duck on rug in front of CHI
MOT turns jack+in+the+box around and then turns its handle
MOT continues to turn handle of jack+in+the+box
CHI bounces up and down a little
MOT smiles and looks at CHI
CHI looks at MOT then back at jack+in+the+box
<aft> MOT opens top of jack+in+the+box more and pushes jack+in+the+box towards CHI
<bef> CHI feels clown then feels sides of jack+in+the+box and handle and pushes jack+in+the+box
MOT pushes clown back in jack+in+the+box and turns jack+in+the+box around then turns handle
CHI looks at MOT and smiles then looks back at jack+in+the+box
MOT smiles at CHI then looks back at jack+in+the+box
MOT keeps turning handle of jack+in+the+box
CHI looks at MOT then back at jack+in+the+box
CHI watches MOT pick up duck
MOT squeezes duck in front of CHI
CHI takes duck from MOT and squeezes it
MOT rolls car on rug then rolls it into CHIs leg
CHI examines duck then feels jack+in+the+box clown
MOT smiles at CHI and nods head
CHI lets go of clowns head
MOT lets go of clown then takes it again and pushes it back and looks at it then lets go again
CHI pushes jack+in+the+box then feels head of clown again
CHI pushes side of jack+in+the+box again
MOT pushes clown back into jack+in+the+box and turns handle on jack+in+the+box
CHI watches what MOT does with jack+in+the+box and smiles
CHI looks at MOT then back at jack+in+the+box
MOT looks at CHI and smiles
MOT continues to turn handle on jack+in+the+box
CHI glances at MOT then looks back at clown
MOT looks at CHI and smiles
CHI touches side of jack+in+the+box then grabs clowns head again
<bef> MOT opens lid to jack+in+the+box more then holds clown head
CHI watches what MOT is doing with clown
CHI feels clowns head as MOT pushes it into jack+in+the+box
MOT pushes CHIs hand away and shuts lid on jack+in+the+box then turns handle of jack+in+the+box
CHI watches what MOT does with jack+in+the+box
CHI looks at MOT then at rubber duck in his hand
<aft> CHI squeezes duck several times then drops duck
MOT continues to turn handle on jack+in+the+box
<bef> CHI hits clown on back of head then feel side of jack+in+the+box
MOT grabs clowns head and wiggles it at CHI
CHI watches MOT then reaches for clown head
MOT waves clowns hand at CHI
MOT pulls clowns head away from CHI
MOT holds CHIs hand out of way and pushes clown into jack+in+the+box
MOT shuts lid of jack+in+the+box then starts to turn handle
CHI watches MOT turn handle then looks at MOT
MOT continues turning handle of jack+in+the+box
CHI scratches at lid of jack+in+the+box trying to open it then pulls hand back
MOT looks at CHI and makes surprised face
MOT turns jack+in+the+box slightly and opens lid more
CHI lets go of clown then hits it on head and tries to push it back into jack+in+the+box
CHI continues to try to push clown into jack+in+the+box
MOT puts her hand on head of jack+in+the+box
MOT slowly pushes clowns head into jack+in+the+box
MOT continues to slowly push clown into jack+in+the+box
CHI puts hand on clowns head and helps push it into jack+in+the+box
MOT starts to shut lid of jack+in+the+box
MOT shuts lid of jack+in+the+box and starts to turn the handle
CHI watches MOT turn handle on jack+in+the+box
MOT continues to turn handle of jack+in+the+box
CHI bounces up and down again . <aft> CHI pounds on lid of jack+in+the+box then stops
MOT continues to turn handle of jack+in+the+box
CHI touches clowns face then hits clowns head then pushes clown into jack+in+the+box
MOT starts to shut lid of jack+in+the+box
CHI takes hand out of jack+in+the+box
MOT closes lid of jack+in+the+box then turns the handle
<bef> CHI feels lid of jack+in+the+box then sits back and bounces up and down
MOT continues to turn handle of jack+in+the+box
<aft> CHI pats lid of jack+in+the+box with hand several times
<aft> CHI looks at MOT then back at jack+in+the+box
MOT continues to turn handle of jack+in+the+box
CHI pulls at lid of jack+in+the+box
CHI lets go of lid of jack+in+the+box
CHI takes clowns head and pushes it back into jack+in+the+box
MOT opens lid of jack+in+the+box more
CHI lets clown pop up out of jack+in+the+box
CHI pushes clown back into jack+in+the+box
MOT puts fingers on clowns head and helps CHI push it in jack+in+the+box
CHI takes hand out of jack+in+the+box
CHI feel lid of jack+in+the+box with hand
CHI picks at lid of jack+in+the+box
MOT starts to turn handle of jack+in+the+box
MOT continues to turn handle of jack+in+the+box
CHI puts hand on lid of jack+in+the+box
CHI lets go of lid and takes clowns head and pushes it into jack+in+the+box then lets go and grabs lid then repeats the sequence again
MOT puts finger on clowns head
CHI pushes clown into jack+in+the+box again
CHI takes hand out of jack+in+the+box and shuts lid
MOT holds jack+in+the+box down and helps CHI shut lid of jack+in+the+box then turns handle
CHI feels and picks at lid of jack+in+the+box then sits back and lets go of jack+in+the+box
MOT continues to turn handle of jack+in+the+box
CHI picks at lid of jack+in+the+box again
MOT continues to turn handle of jack+in+the+box
CHI pulls jack+in+the+box over by the lid then lets go
MOT puts hand on jack+in+the+box then lets go
CHI pushes clown back into jack+in+the+box
MOT puts hand on jack+in+the+box lid
CHI pulls hand out of jack+in+the+box
MOT closes lid of jack+in+the+box and turns handle
INV enters room . End of Warm Up Activity
INV takes forbidden object out of drawer and sets it on table in front of CHI
CHI looks at object and smiles
MOT takes CHIs arm and pulls it back from object then lets go
MOT looks at CHI and nods head
CHI looks back at object and smiles
CHI looks at object then down at table
CHI looks at MOT then back at INV
INV picks up object from table
INV explains PCI activities then leaves room and shuts door
CHI kneels facing door looking after INV
MOT sits in front of CHI and holds ball in her hands
CHI looks at MOT with his back to camera
CHI continues to look at MOT
MOT picks up CHI and places him in sitting position
<aft> MOT moves CHIs leg then rolls ball to him between his legs
ball rolled out of CHIs lap
MOT rolls ball back to CHI
CHI is sitting sideview to camera
CHI pats ball with hands several times then rolls it towards MOT
MOT rolls ball back to CHI
MOT rolls ball back to CHI
MOT holds hands out towards CHI
CHI picks up ball and throws it towards MOT
MOT rolls ball back to CHI
CHI holds ball with both hands
MOT holds hands out towards CHI
CHI throws ball then pats hands on legs
MOT picks up ball then rolls it to CHI
CHI holds ball and pats it with hands
MOT holds hands out towards CHI
MOT picks up ball and rolls it back to CHI
CHI catches ball and holds it with both hands
MOT leans towards CHI and smiles
MOT holds hands out to CHI
CHI picks up ball and throws it to MOT then flaps his arms up and down on his legs
<bef> CHI catches ball and pats it a couple times
MOT makes excited face and holds hands out to CHI for ball
<bef> MOT put hands down then holds them out to CHI again
CHI picks up ball then drops it in his lap and hits it several times
MOT rolls ball back to CHI
MOT holds hands out for ball
MOT bounces ball back to CHI
CHI starts to roll ball to MOT then stops and pats it then rolls it to MOT
CHI catches ball then rolls it to MOT
CHI catches ball then rolls it back to MOT
MOT tosses ball back to CHI
CHI reaches for ball and misses
MOT rolls ball back to CHI
MOT rolls ball away from CHI then rolls it back to him
<aft> CHI looks at MOT then back at ball
<bef> MOT holds her hands out for ball
MOT knocks ball out of CHIs hands
CHI looks at MOT then at ball
MOT watches ball then looks at CHI smiling
MOT looks at ball then back at CHI smiling
MOT nods head in direction of ball
MOT nods and waves hand in direction of ball
CHI continues to look at MOT
MOT reaches over to ball and rolls it behind CHI
CHI watches what MOT does with ball
CHI turns around and crawls to ball then rolls ball and crawls after it
CHI sits next to ball and leans against wall and touches and looks at wall then turns back to ball and holds it with one hand
CHI holds ball with one hand
MOT holds hands out to CHI then drops them
MOT leans forward and with one finger tries to roll ball away from CHI
MOT tries to roll ball away from CHI again
MOT rolls ball away from CHI
MOT rolls ball back to CHI
CHI tries to catch ball then crawls after it and puts hand on it
MOT holds hands out for ball
<bef> CHI looks at MOTs hands then sits and rolls ball into his lap
MOT moves close to CHI and tickles his side
MOT puts ball back on desk
MOT looks at CHI then back at desk
CHI looks at his legs then back at MOT
MOT sits down on rug holding blanket
MOT raises towel up covering her face
CHI crawls towards MOT then sits facing MOT
<bef> MOT raises blanket back up covering face
MOT peeks at CHI from corner of blanket
CHI touches blanket with one hand
MOT holds blanket up in front of CHIs face
CHI pushes on blanket with one hand
CHI looks at MOT then at blanket
MOT holds blanket out to CHI
<aft> CHI starts to hold blanket up in front of his face
CHI lowers blanket and looks at MOT
MOT takes blanket and pulls it up covering CHIs face
MOT pulls blanket away from CHI
MOT holds blanket up in front of her face
MOT pulls blanket down so just her eyes are showing
CHI smiles at MOT then reaches for blanket
MOT holds blanket out to CHI
CHI pulls blanket up with one hand
MOT holds up blanket in front of CHIs face
MOT raises blanket to cover CHIs face again
MOT lets go of blanket and CHI lowers it
MOT puts towel over CHIs head
CHI looks at MOT and smiles
MOT puts blanket over her head
CHI continues to look at MOT
<bef> MOT drops blanket off her head
CHI watches MOT then looks around the room
CHI continues to look around room
MOT places piece of paper and crayons between CHIs legs
CHI looks at paper and crayons
MOT picks up a crayon and draws on paper then pushes paper closer to CHI and puts down crayon
MOT makes a face at camera and smiles and waves
CHI picks up other crayon and puts it in his mouth
MOT takes CHIs hand away from mouth
<aft> MOT picks up crayon and colors then puts crayon down
CHI puts crayon in his mouth
MOT puts hand on CHIs arm
MOT pulls CHIs hand away from mouth
CHI puts crayon back in mouth
MOT pulls CHIs hand away from mouth again
CHI pulls hands away from MOT
CHI picks up crayon and puts it in his mouth
MOT picks up crayon on paper then sets it down quickly
MOT pulls CHIs hand away from mouth
CHI pulls hand away from MOT then puts crayon in mouth again
MOT pulls CHIs hand away from mouth
MOT picks up other crayon from paper
CHI reaches for crayon MOT just picked up
CHI ends up kneeling on the paper
MOT pulls at paper CHI is kneeling on
CHI turns and looks at paper
MOT colors on paper then sets crayon down then colors with other crayon and sets it down
CHI picks up crayon and puts it in his mouth
MOT pulls CHIs hand away from mouth
CHI pulls hand away from MOT and puts crayon back in mouth
MOT pulls CHIs hand away from mouth then takes crayon away from him
MOT picks up other crayon and grabs paper
CHI watches MOT take paper away
MOT puts paper back on desk
MOT fiddles on desk with boxes
MOT sits down near CHI and puts book on rug
MOT sets CHI on her lap then picks up book and holds it in front of CHI
MOT points to picture in book
CHI looks at book and smiles
CHI looks towards MOT and smiles then looks at the ceiling
CHI points to page of book
<aft> CHI smiles and looks at book
CHI grabs book and pushes it away
MOT holds onto book and opens it in front of CHI again
CHI takes book from MOT and feels corner of page
CHI picks at edge of pages
CHI watches MOT turn page then looks at book
MOT moves thumb around on page
CHI points to pictures on page
MOT looks at what CHI is pointing at
CHI points at something in upper corner of picture
CHI takes hold of book and turns it over then points to picture on cover then turns book right side up again
CHI points to picture on page then pulls hand away
CHI points to pictures in book
CHI turns book over and looks at back and feels edge
CHI turns pages of book then shuts it
CHI plays with pages of book
MOT opens last page of book
